question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. brown hat
B. white hat
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The person wearing the white hat is in the foreground, partially obscuring the view, while the person with the brown hat is further back on the zebra, making the white hat wearer clearly closer to the camera.
